items.title: Who was Renee Nicole Good, the woman killed by ICE?
items.description: A mother of three and award-winning poet, Good's sudden death sparks protests across the US.

items.title: Vance criticises Denmark and Europe's handling of 'critical' Greenland
items.description: European allies of Denmark have rejected Trump's ideas to annex the semi-autonomous territory.

items.title: Brook, Boozeball and another Ashes hangover
items.description: Harry Brook's incident in New Zealand comes at the end of an Ashes tour undermined by the culture of the England team, writes Stephan Shemilt.

items.title: Business rate rises for pubs to be watered down after pressure from landlords
items.description: The hospitality industry had called for a rethink of planned changes to the way the tax based on property is calculated.

items.title: Fourteen clifftop homes face 'imminent' collapse
items.description: People are told their homes should not be occupied due to a risk of cliff falls caused by storms.
